ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is a warning like the warnings of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He who warns you is one of the warners of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is a warning among the warnings of yore.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is a (Prophet) like that of the ancient warners (Prophets).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) is a Herald of Warning, like the former Heralds of Warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is a warner from the warners of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is a warner of the warners of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is a warner, of the warners of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is a warner of the warners of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is a warning just like those of former times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is a warner of the warners of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is a warner, [in the tradition] of the warners of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is a Warner, of the (series of) Warners of old!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This (Muhammad SAW) is a warner (Messenger) of the (series of) warners (Messengers) of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is a warner from the warners of ancient times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is a warning, just like the first warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:56]   This, Muhammad (s), is a warner, [in the tradition] of the warners of old, of their kind, that is to say, he is a messenger like messengers before him, sent to you just as they were sent to their peoples.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is a warner) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) is a warning Messenger (of the warners of old) like the earlier messengers whom We sent to their folks; it is also said that this means: this is a messenger among the messengers of old whom it is written, in the Guarded Tablet, that We would sent to their folks.
